recipes.name: Chicken & Bean Stew
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in oil. Add chicken, beans, broth, tomato, lime juice, herbs, and spices. Bring to a boil, then simmer 1 hour. Top with red pepper flakes if desired.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, bell pepper, carrot)
recipes.instructions: Heat oil in a wok, add garlic and ginger. Stir-fry vegetables 5–7 minutes. Add soy sauce, toss, and serve hot.

recipes.name: Fruit Salad
recipes.instructions: Mix fruits in a bowl. Whisk lime juice and honey, pour over fruits, toss gently, and garnish with mint.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion & garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes & broth, simmer 20 mins. Blend until smooth, stir in basil, season to taste.

recipes.name: Grilled Lemon Herb Chicken
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken with lemon juice, oil, garlic, oregano, salt & pepper for 30 mins. Grill 5–6 mins per side until cooked through.

recipes.name: Classic Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Brown beef in oil, sprinkle with flour. Add onion, tomato paste, broth, herbs, and veggies. Simmer 2 hrs until beef is tender and sauce is thick.

recipes.name: Mango Banana Smoothie
recipes.instructions: Blend mango, banana, milk, yogurt, honey, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Virgin Mojito
recipes.instructions: Muddle mint, lime, and sugar in a glass. Fill with ice, top with soda water, and stir.

recipes.name: Lemon Iced Tea
recipes.instructions: Steep tea bags in hot water 5 mins. Remove bags, stir in sugar & lemon juice. Chill, then serve over ice.

recipes.name: Whiskey Sour
recipes.instructions: Shake whiskey, lemon juice, and syrup with ice. Strain into a glass with ice.

recipes.name: Classic Margarita
recipes.instructions: Shake tequila, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a salt-rimmed glass over ice.

recipes.name: Cosmopolitan
recipes.instructions: Shake vodka, cranberry, triple sec, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.
